name: Misdirection Boy!
description:
A product of Train Jam 2019.

As the bus boy for an up and coming restaurant, you've been tasked by the owner to hit the streets and manage crowds so that nobody has to spend too long in the line. They're worried that the wait time will reflect badly on social media.

Run around and talk to people to get them to window shop at nearby locations to keep the line down and force others to reroute the long way! Your bonus depends on it.
